short_description: Use of Email / Anti-Publishing Policy We will use email to communicate with you after you provide us your email address to gain access to our services.
long_description: Use of Email / Anti-Publishing Policy We will use email to communicate with you after you provide us your email address to gain access to our services. Why: We collect this information to enable us to deliver the services defined in your service agreemen. How We Use Personal Information CID uses the data we collect to provide you with the products and services we offer, which includes using data to improve and personalise your IT experiences.
